Title: Good daughter of the poor-and-lower-middle peasants
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Four young women, sent to the countryside, talking with two older peasants and a young girl. They are involved in a construction project, most likely creating Dazhai-style terraces for agriculture. The young women's red flag reads 青年突击队 - Youth shock team.
Theme: Iron Women, Foxy LadiesUp to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)Working Women
